name: The Octopus (monninen, Tipu)
description:
A game made for Wowie Jam 4.0 with a theme 'Collaborate With AI'. We implemented the theme by making the player solve puzzles with an AI. We also used an AI in workflow; to generate voice lines.

There was supposed to be music but the music died :D

Controls

  • Arrow keys / WASD   
  • z or space to interact
  • Mouse to click stuff

Credits

  • Tipu: Programming
  • monni: Art

Tools used

  • Unity
  • Photoshop
  • FakeYou.com: voicelines (edited in Adobe Audition)
